Frequently Asked Questions

What happens after I submit?

Your email client will open with your message pre-filled. Send the email, and we'll receive it at info@spadesinstitute.org. We typically respond within one week.

What types of partnerships do you consider?

We work with government agencies, industry leaders, academic institutions, and nonprofits. We're particularly interested in partnerships that advance ethics, democracy, and freedom through trusted collaboration.

How quickly will I receive a response?

We aim to respond to all inquiries within one week. For urgent matters, please note that in your message subject line.

Connecting government, industry, and academia to solve national security priorities through trusted, nonpartisan collaboration.

501(c)(3) nonprofit · EIN 99-2763425
